root: ^Jesse and Alex are hiding behind the kitchen table. One reads a magazine, the other holds a lighter.
^The "Claire surprise party" is about to start any minute now.
^"What is taking her so long?!" Alex asks, clearly irritated.
^"Probably traffic... Claire is not the best driver." Jesse answers.
^"So..." Jesse says. "What did you get Claire?"

c-0: ^"Only the best gift ever!" Alex answers, full of confidence.
^Jesse is looking at Alex attentively, to which Alex just smiles in response.
^"That's nice..." Jesse finally says after a stretched pause.
c-1: ^"Nothing special, just a small thing." Alex says, with a small smile.
c-2: ^"Ohh... You'll see it soon..." Alex says, smiling sneakily.
^"Keeping it mysterious... I see..." Jesse answers, with a mischievous smile of

N2: ^"What about you?" Alex inquires. "Ready to impress Claire?"

c-0: ^"I tried to get something special." Jesse says, seeming genuine.
^Jesse smiles, probably thinking about the gift.
c-1: ^"I got her a nice gift..." Jesse answers, looking down at
c-2: ^"Soon enough you will find out." Jesse answers, trying to add to the mystery.

N3: ^Before they have time to continue with their quirky banter, the friends hear the sound of keys rattling at the door.
^Jesse and Alex are startled by this. Alex jumps up instantly, like a scared cat.
^The lighter describes an arc in the air and hits Jesse on
^Jesse hands the lighter to Alex with a wink.
^Both are moving franticly, trying to light the candles on a cupcake they had laying around the kitchen.
^They manage to light the first candle just in time to see the door starting to open.
^The person that was opening the door enters the house.
^Both candles are lit. Just in time for Claire to walk into the kitchen.
^Birthday chants erupt from both Jesse and Alex as Claire smiles, excited.
^"Happy birthday to you... Happy birthday to you... Happy birthday dear Claire! Happy birthday to you!" They sing in unison.
^"A surprise birthday party? For the 4th year in a row? I'm so surprised!!!"  Claire says sarcastically.

c-0: ^"Yes! I have never been this surprised, to be honest!" Claire answers, with a chuckle.
c-1: ^"Now, for the main event..." Alex says.
^"Ladies and gentlemen this is the moment we've been waiting for..." Jesse sings.

N5: ^"So... Who is going first?" Claire asks, smiling at her friends.
^"Wow, what happened to 'I don't care for the presents?'" Jesse asks, giving her the side-eye.
^"Well..." Claire says with a sly smile. "I am very excited about the cake." She admits.
^After a beat, she adds "There is a cake right?"
NoCake: ^Jesse and Alex exchange looks, and Claire watches their eyes grow wider.
^"I thought you would buy it..." Jesse starts, timidly.
^"Well..." Alex answers. "I thought you would buy it..."
^"It's okay..." Claire finally says after some time.
^"There is a cupcake..." Jesse tells her, trying to make her feel better.
ThereIsCake: ^"Of course there is cake!" Alex says, smiling.
^Claire's mouth draws an O, as she is all excited. "Chocolate?"

b: ^ Both Alex and Jesse wink at Claire.
^ Jesse winks at Claire yet again.

NoChocolateCake: ^Jesse points at Alex as if asking 'did you' in between the lines.
^Alex shakes her head. They look at Claire, shrugging.

b: ^ "Well... At least there are two cakes..." Claire says, trying not to sound too disappointed.
^ "Well... At least there is a cake..." Claire says, clearly disappointed.

AfterCake: ^"So..." Claire finally says after a second. "Who wants to go first?"

^ arm and shaking it vigorously, clearly enthused.

^Claire and Alex's eyes widen as Jesse raises the bag.

^Claire has just received a box set of guaches. Her smile grows wider.
^"This is great, it is exactly what I wanted!" Claire says hugging Jesse. "Thank you."

b: ^ "This is awesome!!! Did you guys plan the best gift ever together?" Claire asks.

^ bag, wrapped in a shinny green paper.

Reaction: ^"Did you enjoy your gifts?" Alex asks, almost upset.
^"I loved them!" Claire starts, smiling at her friends. "But I liked that you guys are here even more!"

b: ^ "I mean it... Plus your gifts were amazing! And they complement each other." Claire says, all smiles.
^ "Ok then..." Claire says, defeated. "How about I tell you my favorite gift after dinner?"

Reaction: ^"Now... Can we please get this party started?" Claire asks finally.
